EmailTemplate.description: Reminder to case owners to update their Anticipated Export Dollar Value with the Actual Dollar Value
EmailTemplate.name: Case - Update with final Expected Value
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: Update Your Recently Closed Export Promotion Case with final Expected Value
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good Day,
You recently closed Export Promotion Case {!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject}.
This is a reminder to please update the Expected Value field (currently: {!Case.Expected_Value__c}) to be the final value of the case.
You can click this link to access your case: https://trade.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Case/{!Case.Id}/view
Regards, ITA Automation
